name: Idle Tower Heroes
description:
Tower Heroes is the story of a magic golden fountain and Gobo the green dragon who protects it from fearless and relentless bandits released from the evil Cave, El Bandido.

Wave after wave, relentless bandits are coming to steal gold from your treasure pool! They get stronger with every wave. Hunt them with your towers and collect shiny bounty gold. Construct and upgrade your towers strategically to shoot down all the bandits.

Gobo the green dragon watches over your valley to protect you. He also keeps the prestige medals you gain when you start over. Use these medals to upgrade your towers to a whole new tier.

Choose from three different towers.
The cannon towers hit multiple bandits within its range
The ice tower sends freezing winds and slows down the bandits
The arrow tower shoots highly accurate arrows to stop bandits effectively

Quickly collect bounty gold after each bandit and bonus gold at the end of each wave

Upgrade your towers to increase your power against stronger waves

If the bandits get too strong call Gobo to wipe the map and earn prestige gems

Use the gems to upgrade tiers of your towers to construct higher and stronger towers
